feature_1.description: Core beliefs of the characters in these films differ significantly.
feature_1.reasoning: Office Space focuses on modern existentialism and discontent with corporate life, while Raiders of the Lost Ark centers on adventure, historical preservation, and moral good versus evil.

feature_2.description: The motivations in both films involve a pursuit but for vastly different ends.
feature_2.reasoning: While both films feature characters driven by a desire to change their circumstances, the contexts and goals of their pursuits are quite different.

feature_3.description: The interactions and relationships among characters are shaped by their environments.
feature_3.reasoning: Office Space deals with everyday workplace interactions, whereas Raiders of the Lost Ark features interactions based on adventure and historical conflicts.

feature_4.description: The narrative structures follow different genres and storytelling methods.
feature_4.reasoning: The comedic, slice-of-life rebellion in Office Space contrasts with the epic adventure and heroism in Raiders of the Lost Ark.
